com.bassintag.tekengine.object.gameobject.behavior.sprite

Class TekSpriteRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.TekObject
      • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.gameobject.behavior.TekBehavior

  • public class TekSpriteRenderer
extends TekBehavior
    TekSpriteRenderer.java created for TekEngine Represents an image that can move, rotate and scale within the world
